sn12.37:1.3: Puranamidam, bhikkhave, kammam abhisankhatam abhisancetayitam vedaniyam datthabbam.
sn12.37:2.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako paticcasamuppadanneva sadhukam yoniso manasi karoti:
sn12.37:2.2: ‘iti imasmim sati idam hoti, imassuppada idam uppajjati;
sn12.37:2.3: imasmim asati idam na hoti, imassa nirodha idam nirujjhati, yadidam—
